cast.overview: What was supposed to be a peaceful protest turned into a violent clash with the police. What followed was one of the most notorious trials in history.
cast.title: The Trial of the Chicago 7

details.biography:
Born and raised in San Francisco, CA, Gillian began performing at a young age. She spent most of her childhood as an aerial contortionist and mime in a pre-professional circus troupe ( bet you haven't heard that one before! ), while also dabbling in dance, ice skating and acting. It wasn't until high school, while talking classes at American Conservatory Theater (ACT), that she really got bit the acting bug and knew she had to pursue a professional career.

Gillian is a graduate of the University of Southern California where she transferred after attending the Tisch School of the Arts at New York University, studying with The Atlantic Acting School and learning she really is a California girl at heart.

Besides acting, Gillian loves anything adventurous, traveling, photography, a good pun, and puppies...lots of puppies.
details.name: Gillian Cooper
